content.prompt: Night Attack on the Sanjô Palace uses continuous narrative, an artistic device that allows the artist to do which of the following?

choices.label: Organize a story’s events through a series of registers
Define space through devices such as atmospheric perspective
Indicate a character’s importance through proportion and scale
Present the main characters multiple times in a single visual field
